articles.title: Coast Guard boat capsizes in Oregon; all 4 crew rescued
articles.description: ASTORIA, Oregon. (AP) — All four crew members were rescued when a Coast Guard boat capsized after encountering heavy wakes in Oregon.
articles.content:
ASTORIA, Oregon. (AP) All four crew members were rescued when a Coast Guard boat capsized after encountering heavy wakes in Oregon.
